replies.author: WDXZC
replies.txt_content:
color 70
@echo off&setlocal enabledelayedexpansion
set a=-1
:ok
set /a a+=1
title 名字 (重启次数:%a%)
:start
java -Xms9G -Xmx12G -jar server.jar -nojline
goto ok
pause

WDXZC 发表于 2018-7-18 16:09
color 70
@echo off&setlocal enabledelayedexpansion
set a=-1
